column4: The State University of New York at Stony Brook
column5: commonly referred to as Stony Brook University
column6: is a public sea-grant and space-grant research university in Stony Brook
column7: New York. It is one of four university centers of the State University of New York system.

column4: Health Quest is a local family of nonprofit hospitals and healthcare providers in the Mid-Hudson Valley and northwestern Connecticut. Our four award-winning hospitals — Northern Dutchess Hospital
column6: Sharon Hospital and Vassar Brothers Medical Center — have deep roots in their respective communities and work together to provide quality care for our patients.
